title: Cannot find file OLOK.OMS
text: This message indicates a drive mapping issue on the KServer. Connect onto the KServer and check the mapped drives on the PC using Windows Explorer. Open the KServer.LOG in C:\K3btg\Omnis and check if there is an error with the drive mappings. Mapped the drives and restart the KServer service. Ask the user on the 64-bit pc and run a 16-bit program.
description:
This message indicates a drive mapping issue on the KServer.


Connect onto the KServer and check the mapped drives on the PC using Windows Explorer.


Open the KServer.LOG in C:\K3btg\Omnis and check if there is an error with the drive mappings.


Mapped the drives and restart the KServer service.


Ask the user on the 64-bit pc and run a 16-bit program.
